00026 bool FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE WaitForOmiscidServiceCallback(const SimpleString fullname, const SimpleString hosttarget, uint16_t port, uint16_t txtLen, const SimpleString txtRecord, void * UserData)
00027 {
00028     OmiscidServiceSearchData * MyData = (OmiscidServiceSearchData *)UserData;
00029
00030     SimpleString Host(hosttarget);
00031
00032     // Set empty service properties regards to Omiscid Service definition
00033     ServiceProperties PropertiesForProxy;
00034     PropertiesForProxy["desc"] = "part";
00035
00036     PropertiesForProxy.ImportTXTRecord( txtLen, (const unsigned char*)txtRecord.GetStr() );
00037
00038 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_AVAHI
00039     // Remove  avahi flag because it will let Omiscid thing that we need to connect to
00040     // the service
00041     PropertiesForProxy.Undefine( "org.freedesktop.Avahi.cookie" );
00042 #endif
00043 
00044     // To say if the service is the one we are looking for...
00045     ServiceProxy * SP = new OMISCID_TLM ServiceProxy( ComTools::GeneratePeerId(), Host, port, PropertiesForProxy ); // MyData->PeerId
00046     if ( SP == NULL )
00047     {
00048         return false;
00049     }
00050
00051     // DevOmiscidTrace( "Look if %s is suitable for me\n", SP->GetName().GetStr() );
00052     if ( MyData->Filter->IsAGoodService( *SP ) == false )
00053     {
00054         // DevOmiscidTrace( "=> no\n", SP->GetName().GetStr() );
00055         delete SP;
00056         return false;
00057     }
00058
00059     // Return the found service
00060     // DevOmiscidTrace( "=> yes\n", SP->GetName().GetStr() );
00061     MyData->Proxy = SP;
00062     return true;
00063 }
00064
00065 } // namespace Omiscid

00078 Service::Service(const SimpleString ServiceName, const SimpleString ClassName)
00079     : ControlServer( ServiceName )
00080 {
00081     if ( ClassName.IsEmpty() )
00082     {
00083         SetClass( CommonServiceValues::GetDefaultServiceClassName() );
00084     }
00085     else
00086     {
00087         SetClass( ClassName );
00088     }
00089 }
00090
00091 Service::~Service()
00092 {
00093     // Destroy our created ComTools
00094     ComTools * pComTools;
00095
00096     for( listInOutput.First(); listInOutput.NotAtEnd(); listInOutput.Next() )
00097     {
00098         pComTools = listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GetComTool();
00099         if ( pComTools )
00100         {
00101             // Destroy it
00102             delete pComTools;
00103             // Set the com tools to null
00104             listInOutput.GetCurrent()->SetComTool(NULL);
00105         }
00106     }
00107 }

00120 bool Service::AddConnector(SimpleString ConnectorName, SimpleString ConnectorDescription, ConnectorKind ConnectorKind)
00121 {
00122     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindInOutput( ConnectorName );
00123     if ( pAtt != NULL )
00124     {
00125         OmiscidError( "A connector named '%s' is already defined.\n", ConnectorName.GetStr() );
00126         return false;
00127     }
00128
00129     Connector * pConnector = new OMISCID_TLM Connector();
00130     if ( pConnector == NULL )
00131     {
00132         OmiscidError( "Could not allocate a new connector\n" );
00133         return false;
00134     }
00135
00136     // Create TCP and UDP ports
00137     pConnector->SetName(ConnectorName);
00138     pConnector->Create();
00139     pAtt = AddInOutput( ConnectorName, pConnector, ConnectorKind );
00140     pAtt->SetDescription( ConnectorDescription );
00141
00142     return true;
00143 }

00150 bool Service::SendToAllClients(SimpleString ConnectorName, char * Buffer, int BufferLen, bool FastSend )
00151 {
00152     if ( Buffer == NULL && BufferLen != 0 )
00153     {
00154         OmiscidError( "Could not send (null) buffer\n" );
00155         return false;
00156     }
00157     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindInOutput( ConnectorName );
00158     if ( pAtt == NULL )
00159     {
00160         OmiscidError( "Could not find connector '%s'.\n", ConnectorName.GetStr() );
00161         return false;
00162     }
00163     if ( pAtt->IsAnInput() )
00164     {
00165         OmiscidError( "Could not send data on an input connector.\n" );
00166         return false;
00167     }
00168
00169     Connector * pConnector = dynamic_cast<Connector *>(pAtt->GetComTool());
00170
00171     // if ReliableSend == true, we should send over udp so the last parameter (udp send)
00172     // must be true
00173     pConnector->SendToAll( BufferLen, Buffer, FastSend );
00174
00175     return true;
00176 }

00188 bool Service::SendToOneClient(SimpleString ConnectorName, char * Buffer, int BufferLen, int PeerId, bool FastSend )
00189 {
00190     if ( Buffer == NULL && BufferLen != 0 )
00191     {
00192         OmiscidError( "Could not send (null) buffer\n" );
00193         return false;
00194     }
00195     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindInOutput( ConnectorName );
00196     if ( pAtt == NULL )
00197     {
00198         OmiscidError( "Could not find connector '%s'.\n", ConnectorName.GetStr() );
00199         return false;
00200     }
00201     if ( pAtt->IsAnInput() )
00202     {
00203         OmiscidError( "Could not send data on an input connector.\n" );
00204         return false;
00205     }
00206
00207     Connector * pConnector = dynamic_cast<Connector *>(pAtt->GetComTool());
00208
00209     // What is it ?
00210     // if ( pConnector->GetMaxMessageSizeForTCP() <= BufferLen )
00211
00212     // if ReliableSend == true, we should send over udp so the last parameter (udp send)
00213     // must be true
00214     if ( pConnector->SendToPeer( BufferLen, Buffer, PeerId, FastSend ) <= 0 )
00215     {
00216         return false;
00217     }
00218
00219     return true;
00220 }

00427 bool Service::ConnectTo(SimpleString LocalConnector, ServiceProxy& ServProxy, SimpleString RemoteConnector)
00428 {
00429     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindInOutput( LocalConnector );
00430     if ( pAtt == NULL )
00431     {
00432         OmiscidError( "Could not find local connector '%s'.\n", LocalConnector.GetStr() );
00433         return false;
00434     }
00435
00436     ConnectionInfos Connection;
00437     if ( ServProxy.GetConnectionInfos( RemoteConnector, Connection ) == false )
00438     {
00439         // OmiscidError already done in GetConnectionInfos
00440         return false;
00441     }
00442
00443     // Check compatibility
00444     switch( pAtt->GetType() )
00445     {
00446         case AnInput:
00447             // Can connect only on output and inoutput
00448             if ( Connection.Type == AnInput )
00449             {
00450                 OmiscidError( "Cound not connect local input connector '%s' to another input connector '%s'\n", LocalConnector.GetStr(), RemoteConnector.GetStr() );
00451                 return false;
00452             }
00453             break;
00454
00455         case AnOutput:
00456             // Can connect only on input and inoutput
00457             if ( Connection.Type == AnOutput )
00458             {
00459                 OmiscidError( "Cound not connect local output connector '%s' to another output connector '%s'\n", LocalConnector.GetStr(), RemoteConnector.GetStr() );
00460                 return false;
00461             }
00462             break;
00463
00464         default:        // inoutput ans other
00465             // Can connect to every thing
00466             break;
00467
00468     }
00469
00470     // Ok, here we go
00471     Connector * pConnector = dynamic_cast<Connector *>(pAtt->GetComTool());
00472
00473     // Let's connect to him
00474     try
00475     {
00476         if ( pConnector->ConnectTo( ServProxy.GetHostName(), Connection.TcpPort ) == 0 )
00477         {
00478             return false;
00479         }
00480     }
00481     catch(SimpleException& e)
00482     {
00483         OmiscidError( "%s (%d)\n.", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00484         return false;
00485     }
00486
00487     return true;
00488 }

00490 bool Service::ConnectTo(SimpleString LocalConnector, ServiceProxy* ServProxy, SimpleString RemoteConnector)
00491 {
00492     if ( ServProxy == NULL )
00493     {
00494         OmiscidError( "Coulnd not connect to (null) proxy service\n" );
00495         return false;
00496     }
00497     return ConnectTo(LocalConnector, *ServProxy, RemoteConnector);
00498 }

00505 bool Service::AddConnectorListener(SimpleString ConnectorName, ConnectorListener * MsgListener)
00506 {
00507     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindInOutput( ConnectorName );
00508     if ( pAtt == NULL )
00509     {
00510         OmiscidError( "Could not find local connector '%s'.\n", ConnectorName.GetStr() );
00511         return false;
00512     }
00513
00514     if ( pAtt->IsAnOutput() )   // can be Input, InOutput, but limited on Output
00515     {
00516         OmiscidTrace( "Could only receive connection/deconnecion notification over %s output connector.\n", ConnectorName.GetStr() );
00517     }
00518
00519     // Get the connector
00520     Connector * pConnector = dynamic_cast<Connector *>(pAtt->GetComTool());
00521
00522     MsgListener->ServiceOfTheConnector = this;
00523
00524     // Link to receive messages
00525     return pConnector->AddCallbackObject( MsgListener );
00526 }

00553 void Service::RemoveAllConnectorListeners(SimpleString ConnectorName)
00554 {

00556     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindInOutput( ConnectorName );
00557     if ( pAtt == NULL )
00558     {

00560         return;
00561     }
00562
00563     // Get the connector
00564     Connector * pConnector = dynamic_cast<Connector *>(pAtt->GetComTool());
00565

00567     pConnector->RemoveAllCallbackObjects();

00573 void Service::RemoveAllConnectorListeners()
00574 {
00575     // Walk amoung all connector
00576     for( listInOutput.First(); listInOutput.NotAtEnd(); listInOutput.Next() )
00577     {
00578         // Get the connector
00579         Connector * pConnector = dynamic_cast<Connector *>(listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GetComTool());
00580
00581         // Retrieve all PeerIds
00582         pConnector->RemoveAllCallbackObjects();
00583     }
00584 }

00592 bool Service::CloseConnection(SimpleString ConnectorName, unsigned int PeerId)
00593 {
00594     // Search connector
00595     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindInOutput( ConnectorName );
00596     if ( pAtt == NULL )
00597     {
00598         OmiscidError( "Could not find local connector '%s'.\n", ConnectorName.GetStr() );
00599         return false;
00600     }
00601
00602     // Get the connector
00603     Connector * pConnector = dynamic_cast<Connector *>(pAtt->GetComTool());
00604
00605     return pConnector->DisconnectPeerId( PeerId );

00625
00630 void Service::CloseAllConnections(SimpleString ConnectorName)
00631 {
00632     // Search connector
00633     InOutputAttribute * pAtt = FindInOutput( ConnectorName );
00634     if ( pAtt == NULL )
00635     {
00636         OmiscidError( "Could not find local connector '%s'.\n", ConnectorName.GetStr() );
00637         return;
00638     }
00639
00640     // Get the connector
00641     Connector * pConnector = dynamic_cast<Connector *>(pAtt->GetComTool());
00642
00643     // Retrieve all PeerIds
00644     SimpleList<unsigned int> PeerIdsList;
00645     pConnector->GetListPeerId( PeerIdsList );
00646     while( PeerIdsList.IsNotEmpty() )
00647     {
00648         pConnector->DisconnectPeerId( PeerIdsList.ExtractFirst() );
00649     }
00650 }
00651
00655 void Service::CloseAllConnections()
00656 {
00657     SimpleList<unsigned int> PeerIdsList;
00658
00659     // Walk amoung all connector
00660     for( listInOutput.First(); listInOutput.NotAtEnd(); listInOutput.Next() )
00661     {
00662         // Get the connector
00663         Connector * pConnector = dynamic_cast<Connector *>(listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GetComTool());
00664
00665         // Retrieve all PeerIds
00666         pConnector->GetListPeerId( PeerIdsList );
00667         while( PeerIdsList.IsNotEmpty() )
00668         {
00669             pConnector->DisconnectPeerId( PeerIdsList.ExtractFirst() );
00670         }
00671     }
00672 }

00677
00678 // Static
00679 ServiceProxy * Service::FindService(ServiceFilter * Filter, unsigned int WaitTime)
00680 {
00681     if ( Filter == NULL )
00682     {
00683         return NULL;
00684     }
00685
00686     // We want to be sure that we destroy data in the rigth order
00687     // Let's do it by ourself
00688     WaitForOmiscidServices * WFOS = new OMISCID_TLM WaitForOmiscidServices;
00689     if ( WFOS == NULL )
00690     {
00691         return NULL;
00692     }
00693
00694     // Add serach information
00695     OmiscidServiceSearchData MyData;
00696
00697     // Ok, I will ask for services
00698     MyData.PeerId = GetServiceId();
00699     MyData.Filter = Filter;
00700
00701     // Ask to work on all service (we do not provide a name)
00702     WFOS->NeedService( WaitForOmiscidServiceCallback, (void*)&MyData);
00703     WFOS->WaitAll(WaitTime);
00704
00705     // Delete by ourself the object. Thus we are sure that
00706     // we will do it at the right time
00707     delete WFOS;
00708
00709     // Delete the filter
00710     delete Filter;
00711
00712     // If not found, return NULL
00713     return MyData.Proxy;
00714 }
00715
00716 ServiceProxy * Service::FindService(ServiceFilter& Filter, unsigned int WaitTime)
00717 {
00718     return FindService(Filter.Duplicate(), WaitTime);
00719 }
00720
00721 ServiceProxyList * Service::FindServices(ServiceFilterList& Filters, unsigned int WaitTime )
00722 {
00723     int i;
00724
00725     if ( Filters.GetNumberOfElements() == 0 )
00726     {
00727         return NULL;
00728     }
00729
00730     // We want to be sure that we destroy data in the rigth order
00731     // Let's do it by ourself
00732     WaitForOmiscidServices *    WFOS = new OMISCID_TLM WaitForOmiscidServices;
00733     OmiscidServiceSearchData  * MyData;
00734
00735     if ( WFOS == NULL )
00736     {
00737         return NULL;
00738     }
00739
00740     for( Filters.First(); Filters.NotAtEnd(); Filters.Next() )
00741     {
00742         MyData = new OMISCID_TLM OmiscidServiceSearchData;
00743         if ( MyData == NULL )
00744         {
00745             // delete WaitForOmiscidServices object
00746             delete WFOS;
00747
00748             // Problem, return nothing
00749             return NULL;
00750         }
00751
00752         // Ok, I will ask for services
00753         MyData->PeerId = GetServiceId();
00754         MyData->Filter = Filters.GetCurrent();
00755
00756         // Ask to work on all service (we do not provide a name)
00757         WFOS->NeedService( WaitForOmiscidServiceCallback, (void*)MyData);
00758     }
00759
00760     // The final result
00761     ServiceProxyList * ResultServicesProxy = NULL;
00762
00763     // Let's serach for the services
00764     bool ret = WFOS->WaitAll(WaitTime);
00765
00766     if ( ret == true && (ResultServicesProxy = new OMISCID_TLM ServiceProxyList) != NULL )
00767     {
00768         // We found what we need and we manadge to construct a list
00769         // Add the resulting proxy to the list
00770         for( i = 0; i < WFOS->GetNbOfSearchedServices(); i++ )
00771         {
00772             ResultServicesProxy->AddTail( (static_cast<OmiscidServiceSearchData*>(WFOS->operator [](i).UserData))->Proxy );
00773         }
00774     }
00775
00776     // delete search object
00777     delete WFOS;
00778
00779     // Delete all OmiscidServiceSearchData used
00780     for( i = 0; i < WFOS->GetNbOfSearchedServices(); i++ )
00781     {
00782         // delete the current i-th OmiscidServiceSearchData
00783         delete static_cast<OmiscidServiceSearchData*>(WFOS->operator [](i).UserData);
00784     }
00785
00786     return ResultServicesProxy;
00787 }

00815
00825 bool Service::SendReplyToMessage( char * Buffer, int BufferLen, const Message& Msg, bool UnreliableButFastSend /* = false */ )
00826 {
00827     ConnectorListener::ExtendedMessageForService * pExtMsg = dynamic_cast<ConnectorListener::ExtendedMessageForService *>((Message*)&Msg);
00828     if ( pExtMsg == (ConnectorListener::ExtendedMessageForService *)NULL )
00829     {
00830         // We do not have correct information
00831         return false;
00832     }
00833
00834     return SendToOneClient( pExtMsg->ReceivedFromConnector, Buffer, BufferLen, pExtMsg->GetPeerId(), UnreliableButFastSend );
00835 }
00836
00848 bool Service::SendReplyToMessage(SimpleString ConnectorName, char * Buffer, int BufferLen, const Message& Msg, bool UnreliableButFastSend /* = false */ )
00849 {
00850     return SendToOneClient( ConnectorName, Buffer, BufferLen, Msg.GetPeerId(), UnreliableButFastSend );
00851 }
